categories: Category:Songs by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes

nodes.text: "Dune Sea Special" was a song written some time before 3643 BBY. It was played by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina in 0 BBY, after playing "Mad About Me."

This track was originally named "Cantina Band #2" on the soundtrack of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. No in-universe name was given to it until Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it can be played in cantina jukeboxes under the name "Dune Sea Special".
